references.name: Mark Hatch
references.title: Sofware Craftsman at Pluralsight
references.message: Luke is an amazing engineer and an all-around great guy. I worked closely with Luke for a year and was always so impressed with his attention to detail, passion to learn and grow, and desire to understand how things work. Luke is an excellent communicator and team player. He is a great asset to our team and any future team that is lucky enough to have him.

references.name: Jared Loosli
references.title: Director Of Software Development at Pluralsight
references.message: I loved working with Luke. He came onto a team that was well established, but had some tricky issues to figure out and Luke jumped in head first right from the start. While he was diligent in the day to day needs of the team, one thing that stood out to me was that Luke would often look ahead to understand what was needed by him or his team in the future. His ability to understand both the macro and micro view of the team's projects was very impressive. Luke was also very diligent in his own personal growth. We talked many times about skills that he would like to develop, both for his own edification and to fulfill his team's needs, and Luke was always thoughtful about managing plans to develop those skills. He definitely has a growth mindset that I appreciated. I would gladly work with Luke again and think he would be a great asset on whatever organization he works with.

profile.early-life: My interest in programming started early, from playing with and eventually taking apart my electronics. I just had to understand how they worked. I take pride in my ability to learn anything related to computers. From video editing, photo editing, web development, 3D illustration I have yet to find a discipline of computer applications that doesnt spark the joy of learning.
profile.early-career: After graduating from the University of Massachusetts Dartmouth I joined Dell EMC. My first years of employment helped me understand the full development lifecycle. Being in a role surrounded by colleagues with decades of experience helped me to envisage concepts of computer architecture that we invisible to me before. However, this role left me wanting to take on a leadership role myself.
profile.present-day: I found my stride at Pluralsight LLC, where I was able to lead a product aquisition team and evaluate and plan key changes to both platforms moving forward. I showed that not only was I capable of full stack development, but could actively guide a team in that role. In my next role I'm looking for a project that ignites my passion to learn and allows me to work with individuals who are as eager as I am to create elegant and cutting edge technology.

tools.title: Github
tools.description: GitHub, Inc. is an Internet hosting service for software development and version control using Git. It provides the distributed version control of Git plus access control, bug tracking, software feature requests, task management, continuous integration, and wikis for every project.

tools.title: Unreal Engine
tools.description: Unreal Engine is the world's most open and advanced real-time 3D creation tool for photoreal visuals and immersive experiences.

tools.title: React
tools.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on components. It is maintained by Meta and a community of individual developers and companies.

tools.title: Blender
tools.description: Blender is a free and open-source 3D computer graphics software tool set used for creating animated films, visual effects, art, 3D-printed models, motion graphics, interactive 3D applications, and virtual reality.

tools.title: VS Code
tools.description: Visual Studio Code, also commonly referred to as VS Code, is a source-code editor made by Microsoft with the Electron Framework, for Windows, Linux and macOS. Features include support for debugging, syntax highlighting, intelligent code completion, snippets, code refactoring, and embedded Git.

tools.title: Node.js
tools.description: Node.js is a back-end JavaScript runtime environment, runs on the V8 JavaScript Engine, and executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.

tools.title: Docker
tools.description: Docker is a set of platform as a service products that use OS-level virtualization to deliver software in packages called containers.

tools.title: Postman
tools.description: Postman is an API Platform for developers to design, build, test and iterate their APIs.

tools.title: MongoDB
tools.description: MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database program. Classified as a NoSQL database program, MongoDB uses JSON-like documents with optional schemas.

tools.title: PostgreSQL
tools.description: PostgreSQL, also known as Postgres, is a free and open-source relational database management system emphasizing extensibility and SQL compliance.
